text: James Edward Winston Langwith (20 April 1945 â€“ 26 September 2020), known professionally as Jimmy Winston, was an English musician and actor. He was the original keyboard player with Small Faces. He was born in London. As an actor, his best known roles were in Hair and the 1972 Doctor Who serial Day of the Daleks. Winston died on 26 September 2020 at the age of 75.Room For Ravers: Jimmy Winston ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British keyboardists Category:English rock musicians Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from London Category:Musicians from London Category:Singers from London
